title: ScsiPeripheral_RequestSenseRequest
summary: Driver Development Kit Driver 模块的 ScsiPeripheral_RequestSenseRequest，提供相关接口和功能说明。

sections.title: 概述
sections.summary:
SCSI命令（request sense）的请求结构体。

**起始版本：** 18

**相关模块：** [ScsiPeripheralDDK](capi-scsiperipheralddk.md
